Cluster Builder

Automatically Deploy Kubernetes Container Orchestration Clusters into VMware Environments.

Updated for 2024!

Using only freely available tools and only an annotated Ansible inventory file cluster-builder enables the configuration and deployment of Kubernetes clusters to vSphere/ESXi hypervisors and local VMware Workstation/Fusion Pro environments.

One commandâ€¦ and the cluster is deployed!

cluster-builder uses Packer, Ansible, Bash and VMware tools to deploy Kubernetes kubeadm clusters into VMware environments.

cluster-builder has been updated for 2024 with Kubernetes 1.29 and rocky9-k8s, using Rocky Linux 9.4.
